name: QI
description:
QI

Sakura has asked Ryu to meet him at the school. She seems to have something important to tell him. A starry night and meeting between two friends. What challenge awaits Ryu !?

QI is a single one-boss-fight turn-based game made with RPG maker MV. Help Ryu defeat God for Sakura.


  • One-boss-fight
  • Defeat God


Notes
Around 120 min boss fight.
